customer_addr:

HILLSBORO, WI 54634

citations.narrative:
An enclosure housing four adult dogs in the upper building had an area of metal siding that has rusted by the floor and
now has rough edges exposed. Rough edges could hurt dogs. Ensure to maintain areas dogs can touch free from any
sharp points or edges.
***Correct by 1/13/2025.

The facility has a written exercise plan that was written and signed by the previous Attending Veterinarian (AV). A written
exercise program has to be approved by the current AV . Ensure to work with the current AV on approval of a written
exercise plan.
***Correct by 1/30/2025.

The facility has an Attending Veterinarian (AV) and written Program of Veterinary care (PVC), however the PVC has not
been signed by the current AV. The written PVC is required to be signed by the AV. Ensure that the written PVC is signed
by the AV.
***Correct by 1/30/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
An enclosure housing four adult dogs in the upper building had an area of metal siding that has rusted by the floor and 
now has rough edges exposed. Rough edges could hurt dogs. Ensure to maintain areas dogs can touch free from any 
sharp points or edges.  
***Correct by 1/13/2025. 
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
The facility has a written exercise plan that was written and signed by the previous Attending Veterinarian (AV). A written 
exercise program has to be approved by the current AV . Ensure to work with the current AV on approval of a written 
exercise plan. 
***Correct by 1/30/2025. 
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has an Attending Veterinarian (AV) and written Program of Veterinary care (PVC), however the PVC has not 
been signed by the current AV. The written PVC is required to be signed by the AV. Ensure that the written PVC is signed 
by the AV.  
***Correct by 1/30/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
